page.title: 02 EMPLOYMENT IN THE AREA.
page.content: A survey of the parents of the school children largely taken from council rented property showed that most employed men were in some form of engineering,either mechanical or electrial 1.e.25o/o.The second highest job was that of a tradesman e.g.joiner,plumber,painter or builder. The regions main problem is reflected in the fact that 15 per cent of the survey showed unemployment.Many of these have only recently become unemployed despite the presence of two large industrial estates within the area. Women answering our survey showed that the majority of employed women are in sevices i.e.shop assistants,clerical workers,office cleaners etc.In general people travelled 4-5 miles to work.
